idea-plugin.name: Highlight Colors for Compose
idea-plugin.description:
Draws rectangle on editor's gutter denoting the color represented by androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color
Clicking on the color icon from the gutter will open a color picker dialog to modify the color.
